title: Resetting Your Password
content: To reset your password, go to the login screen and click 'Forgot Password'. Follow the instructions sent to your email.

title: Changing Your Email Address
content: To update your email, navigate to Account Settings > Profile and enter your new email address.

title: Inviting Team Members
content: Admins can invite teammates by going to the Team tab and clicking 'Invite New Member'. Enter their email and assign a role.

title: Viewing Past Orders
content: Go to the Orders section under your dashboard to see a full history of your past orders.

title: Cancelling an Order
content: Orders can be canceled within 30 minutes of placement from the Orders page by clicking 'Cancel'.

title: Accepted Payment Methods
content: We accept Visa, Mastercard, AMEX, and ACH transfers. You can update your payment method in Billing Settings.

title: Adding a Billing Address
content: To add or change your billing address, go to Billing Settings and click 'Edit Address'.

title: Understanding Your Invoice
content: Invoices include a breakdown of items, quantities, and taxes. Download them from the Billing > Invoices tab.

title: Assigning Roles to Team Members
content: Roles can be changed from the Team page. Click on a team member and select a new role from the dropdown.

title: Enabling Two-Factor Authentication
content: To enable 2FA, go to Security Settings and follow the steps to pair your authenticator app.

title: Resetting your password
content: Click 'Forgot Password' on the login page and follow the email instructions.

title: Updating your email address
content: Go to account settings and type your new email, then save.

title: Canceling an order
content: You can cancel an order within 30 minutes from the Orders page.

title: Adding a payment method
content: Go to Billing > Payment Methods and add your card or bank info.

title: Inviting teammates
content: Admins can invite users from the Team page using their email address.
